title: Nifty Bearish Trade - Potential Breakdown
logic: Nifty is showing bearish momentum on RSI and MACD. Buying the 25300 PUT offers a chance to capitalize on further downside movement. Price is testing support.

title: BankNifty Bearish Trade - Momentum Breakdown
logic: BankNifty showing bearish signals on RSI and MACD with a 65% confidence, potentially breaking support at 55535.1. The 55000 PUT offers good potential.

title: Nifty Range Bound Play - Iron Condor

setup.strike: Nifty 25050 PUT & Nifty 25500 PUT , Nifty 25500 CALL & Nifty 25100 PUT

logic: Nifty showing BEARISH sentiment, the Iron Condor strategy aims to profit from time decay while Nifty stays within a defined range. Selling OTM calls and puts while buying further OTM calls and puts to cap the risk.
